Our platform helps both novice and experienced traders make informed decisions through real-time market analysis and intelligent predictions.

settings.title: Security Settings
settings.description: Manage your face authentication and login security
settings.biometricDescription: Quick & secure authentication with your face
settings.name: Name:
settings.step1: You'll capture a secure face profile
settings.step2: Data is encrypted and stored safely
settings.step3: Use your face to login next time
settings.step4: You can update or disable anytime
settings.privacyText: We store only a mathematical representation of your face, not actual photos. Your data is never shared with third parties.
settings.confirmDisableFaceAuth: Are you sure you want to disable face authentication?
settings.errorDisablingFaceAuth: An error occurred while disabling face authentication
settings.setupMessage: Set up face authentication to enable quick login without typing your password.
settings.activeMessage: Your face authentication is active and ready to use for login.
settings.tipText: You can still use your email and password to login if needed. Face authentication is optional.
